website_summaries.verdict: Offers exceptional beauty and quality in a versatile style. Our top pick; it's worth the price.
pros: Attractive traditional design complements almost any lamp base
Classic hardback style covered with quality linen fabric
cons: On the higher end of the price spectrum, but you get exceptional quality for the money

customer_reviews.title: I bought much better quality shades from Pottery Barn which were cheaper and ...
customer_reviews.text: The clear plastic wrap on the shades was absolutely filthy with black dust, and it was torn so that some of the oily dust transferred to the white shades. They clearly have sat for months, if not years, in a warehouse and are the level of garage sale items. I bought much better quality shades from Pottery Barn which were cheaper and lined; these are not.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: Bad Packaging, Lampshade arrives bent and dented.
customer_reviews.text: This item is a beautiful quality lampshade, just what i wanted. However...,It was shipped in a box that was too small. the box and the lampshade were both bashed and dented. I sent it back for a new one and received the exact same thing. Bashed and dented box and lampshade. The Lampshade is about an 1-1 1/2 inches too wide for the box. Very disappointing to receive something in worse shape than the one I was going to replace.
customer_reviews.author: D johnnson

customer_reviews.title: A Royal Design Lamp Shade makes my lamp look expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Royal Designs lamp shade. It makes my inexpensive ceramic lamp base look expensive. It's contemporary and well made, worth every dollar. Next time though I'll be sure to buy a paper shade. The linen fibers show when the light is on and the shade turns tan, a characteristic of linen that I didn't know. The selection of shades is great and the quality, now that I have it at home, is apparent. I'll shop at Royal Designs again.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice
customer_reviews.text: Sized perfectly as described. The shades arrived timely and, most importantly, in perfect condition. The light coming from a lit lamp with these shades in place has a yellow glow - not bright white - because of the material used on the lampshade. Lovely for background/daily lighting but might not be bright enough if you were using these shades on a lamp used for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect update for an iron lamp base! The burlap does dim the lightbulb's light... It's more of a warm glow than a bright light... but it doesn't particularly bother me because I have another lamp in the same room. Great price, excellent quality! Can't ask for anything more.
customer_reviews.author: eeebrrr

customer_reviews.title: Right color, shape and size
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a shade and wanted the new shade to match, as closely as possible, the existing shades. This one is almost the exact same shade as the current shades and it's the perfect size and shape. It was slightly dented during shipping, someone did a crappy job of packing. I was still able to use the shade and the side that was dented doesn't show.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love these shades
customer_reviews.text: What can I say???? Shades are Perfect. Exactly as described. Could not find 1 shade this size locally. they are beautiful. Construction is great well worth the price. Will always shop here for future shades
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love the shade, but...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality shade. I'm bummed that it arrived with two dented sides. Not worth paying shipping to return. I'm going to use it anyway, as it's in a low traffic area. I don't understand why box isn't bent or ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Royal!
customer_reviews.text: Once again your product was beyond my expectations - superb craftsmanship & great style. The cost was in the range I have paid before for shades of lesser value. This is my 3rd order of your shades through Amazon - great teamwork. Shipping was a breeze. One improvementioned for me would be if you teamed the correct sized harp with the shade as an option. Updating lamps would be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Made Shade, great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Well made lamp, shatung fabric has a textured appearance I really like. Very pleased with the color also - white - not a glaring white, more of a soft, off white. Customer service rep extremely helpful with questions I had before my purchase. Very pleased with Royal Designs; will definitely shop with them again.
customer_reviews.author: 3jayzmom

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on our two lamps
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for 2 Potterybarn lamps. I wasn't about to spend PB prices, these were 1/2 the price and look really good!
customer_reviews.author: M573109

customer_reviews.title: I simply can't throw shade on this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I still can't believe a shade of this quality was available at such a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: Vegazon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking lamp shade for the price. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Nice, high quality shade
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed. The picture represents the true color, which is a tad lighter than the other burlap shades I've seen. I only wish the hardware was bronze instead of gold.
customer_reviews.author: Cassondra

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shade
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shade. Looks like silk and the gold interior is a nice luxe touch
customer_reviews.author: Mamareview

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we need to block light from tv screen!
customer_reviews.author: William T. Morecraft

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, elegant, yet understated. Goes perfectly with my new lamp!
customer_reviews.author: ExLibrisHolland

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: Great folks to do business with. High integrity and nice product.
customer_reviews.author: reed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were better than I expected. The fabric is very nice and I am a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie A Wedge

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described. My wife was sure we would ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. My wife was sure we would not be able to find a replacement shade for the antique floor lamp (after I busted the shade on it). A few measurements, a little time on Amazon, and voila - it shows up in box.
customer_reviews.author: D. Corddry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, elegant
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a slightly smaller shade - it's made a huge difference in how the entire lamp looks. Before it was "just a floor lamp", nothing special. Now with this large shade it puts a finishing touch, so important, to add final elegance, class to room. Recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Collins

product_meta.title: Royal Designs HB-606-20LNWH Tapered Shallow Drum Hardback Lamp Shade, Linen White, 14 x 20 x 13
product_meta.description: Size:14 x 20 x 13| Color:Linen WhiteThis tapered shallow drum hardback lampshade - Linen White 14 x 20 x 13 is a part of Royal Designs, Inc. Timeless hardback lampshade Collection and is perfect for anyone who is looking for a simple yet stunning lampshade. Royal designs has been in the lampshade business since 1993 with their multiple shade lines that exemplify handcrafted quality and value. Exterior fabric: premium linen fabric interior fabric: off-white hardback lining washer: standard brass-finish spider Fitter, use a finial to fasten shade trim: fabric on top and bottom is rolled over the edges frame: heavy grade rust resistant brass frame bulb: suggested maximum wattage is 150-watt for most sizes height is measured by vertical height from top to bottom, not slant of the shade.
feature_bullets: Shade Dimensions: 14 x 20 x 13 (top x bottom x height)
Fabric: premium Linen fabric, premium off-white hardback lining
Washer: standard (0.5 inch recess) brass-finish spider Fitter w/trademark stamping. (Shades with 9"+ top diameter have a v-notch Fitter for use with a 6" or 8" reflector bowl)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars48 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
